# CHARON Capital Railgun
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] capital-class railgun that fires a massive slug at extreme velocity, capable of catastrophic damage to enemy ships.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]3 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]0.05 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]15000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]900 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]1350m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]1000u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]350u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]1500u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Single Shot[/color]
